snippet: The police said that the attacker had been trying to rob Wen Hui Ruan; several people walked by his crumpled form before a woman knelt down beside him.
abstract: Family members of retired garment factory worker Wen Hui Ruan gather to mourn on sidewalk near where he was beaten in East Village during a robbery attempt; he later died from his injuries; security video of attack shows several people passing by Ruan's crumpled body before anyone came to his aid; police have identified and are looking for suspect.

byline.original: By JULIE TURKEWITZ and JEFFREY E. SINGER

lead_paragraph: The police said that the attacker had been trying to rob Wen Hui Ruan; several people walked by his crumpled form before a woman knelt down beside him.

headline.main: Family Mourns at Site of a Fatal Beating
headline.print_headline: Family Mourns at Site of a Fatal Beating
